        public void search(java.lang.String type,
                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list,
                   java.lang.String skey,
                   java.lang.String sstart,
                   java.lang.String sfinish,
                   javax.swing.JTextArea result)
        search method to search for activities
        Parameters:
        type - string to hold the activity type
        list - array list for all activities
        skey - string to hold user entered key words
        sstart - string to hold user entered start search time
        sfinish - string to hold user entered end search time
        result - text area to receive search results

        stime - string to hold user entered start time

        etime - string to hold user entered end time
        location - string to hold user entered location
